const LoginFormView = ({ username, password }) => (

Login

setUsername(e.target.value)} className="w-full p-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-400" /> setPassword(e.target.value)} className="w-full p-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-400" />
); export default LoginFormView
